verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer had said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Now the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַבְרָ֔ם <S%H87><s%> 'av-Ram, unto Abram לֶךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> lech- Go לְךָ֛ le-Cha מֵאַרְצְךָ֥ <S%H776><s%> me-'ar-tze-Cha of thy country וּמִמּֽוֹלַדְתְּךָ֖ <S%H4138><s%> u-mi-mo-lad-te-Cha and from thy kindred וּמִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> u-mib-Beit house אָבִ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-cha; and from thy father's אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz unto a land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אַרְאֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H7200><s%> 'ar-'E-ka. that I will shew

וְאֶֽעֶשְׂךָ֙ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'e-'es-Cha And I will make of thee לְג֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> le-Goy nation גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol, a great וַאֲבָ֣רֶכְךָ֔ <S%H1288><s%> va-'a-Va-rech-cha, and I will bless וַאֲגַדְּלָ֖ה <S%H1431><s%> va-'a-gad-de-Lah great שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <S%H8034><s%> she-Me-cha; thy name וֶהְיֵ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> veh-Yeh shall be a בְּרָכָֽה׃ <S%H1293><s%> be-ra-Chah. and thou shalt be a blessing

וַאֲבָֽרֲכָה֙ <S%H1288><s%> va-'a-va-ra-Chah And I will bless מְבָ֣רְכֶ֔יךָ <S%H1288><s%> me-Va-re-Chei-cha, them that bless וּמְקַלֶּלְךָ֖ <S%H7043><s%> u-me-kal-lel-Cha him that curseth אָאֹ֑ר <S%H779><s%> 'a-'Or; thee and curse וְנִבְרְכ֣וּ <S%H1288><s%> ve-niv-re-Chu be blessed בְךָ֔ ve-Cha, כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <S%H4940><s%> mish-pe-Chot thee and in thee shall all families הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah. of the earth

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went אַבְרָ֗ם <S%H87><s%> 'av-Ram, So Abram כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber had spoken אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav forth יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, as the LORD וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To to him ל֑וֹט <S%H3876><s%> Lot; unto him and Lot וְאַבְרָ֗ם <S%H87><s%> ve-'av-Ram, with him and Abram בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old חָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh and five שָׁנִים֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim years וְשִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> ve-shiv-'Im was seventy-five שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years בְּצֵאת֖וֹ <S%H3318><s%> be-tze-To when he departed מֵחָרָֽן׃ <S%H2771><s%> me-cha-Ran. out of Haran

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took אַבְרָם֩ <S%H87><s%> 'av-Ram And Abram אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שָׂרַ֨י <S%H8297><s%> sa-Rai Sarai אִשְׁתּ֜וֹ <S%H802><s%> ish-To his wife וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et ל֣וֹט <S%H3876><s%> Lot and Lot בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- son אָחִ֗יו <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv, his brother's וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all רְכוּשָׁם֙ <S%H7399><s%> re-chu-Sham and all their substance אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which רָכָ֔שׁוּ <S%H7408><s%> ra-Cha-shu, that they had gathered וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַנֶּ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> han-Ne-fesh and the souls אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which עָשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su that they had gotten בְחָרָ֑ן <S%H2771><s%> ve-cha-Ran; in Haran וַיֵּצְא֗וּ <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-tze-'U, and they went forth לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet for אַ֣רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'Ar-tzah into the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an, of Canaan וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u they came אַ֥רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'Ar-tzah and into the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an. of Canaan

וַיַּעֲבֹ֤ר <S%H5674><s%> vai-ya-'a-Vor passed through אַבְרָם֙ <S%H87><s%> 'av-Ram And Abram בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz, the land עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad far מְק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> me-Kom unto the place שְׁכֶ֔ם <S%H7927><s%> she-Chem, of Sichem עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad far אֵל֣וֹן <S%H436><s%> e-Lon unto the plain מוֹרֶ֑ה <S%H4176><s%> mo-Reh; of Moreh וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <S%H3669><s%> ve-hak-ke-na-'a-Ni And the Canaanite אָ֥ז <S%H227><s%> 'az [was] then בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz. in the land

וַיֵּרָ֤א <S%H7200><s%> vai-ye-Ra appeared יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַבְרָ֔ם <S%H87><s%> 'av-Ram, unto Abram וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said לְזַ֨רְעֲךָ֔ <S%H2233><s%> le-Zar-'a-cha, Unto thy seed אֶתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten will I give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz land הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot; this וַיִּ֤בֶן <S%H1129><s%> vai-Yi-ven and there builded שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> sham there מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> miz-Be-ach, he an altar לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD הַנִּרְאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> han-nir-'Eh who appeared אֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav. then

וַיַּעְתֵּ֨ק <S%H6275><s%> vai-ya'-Tek And he removed מִשָּׁ֜ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham there הָהָ֗רָה <S%H2022><s%> ha-Ha-rah, from thence unto a mountain מִקֶּ֛דֶם <S%H6924><s%> mik-Ke-dem on the east לְבֵֽית־ le-veit- אֵ֖ל <S%H1008><s%> 'el of Bethel וַיֵּ֣ט <S%H5186><s%> vai-Yet and pitched אָהֳלֹ֑ה <S%H168><s%> 'o-ho-Loh; his tent בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֤ל <S%H1008><s%> 'el [having] Bethel מִיָּם֙ <S%H3220><s%> mi-Yam on the west וְהָעַ֣י <S%H5857><s%> ve-ha-'Ai and Hai מִקֶּ֔דֶם <S%H6924><s%> mik-Ke-dem, on the east וַיִּֽבֶן־ <S%H1129><s%> vai-yi-ven- and there he builded שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> sham and there מִזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> miz-Be-ach an altar לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, unto the LORD וַיִּקְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra and called בְּשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> be-Shem upon the name יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיִּסַּ֣ע <S%H5265><s%> vai-yis-Sa' journeyed אַבְרָ֔ם <S%H87><s%> 'av-Ram, And Abram הָל֥וֹךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Loch going on וְנָס֖וֹעַ <S%H5265><s%> ve-na-So-a' still הַנֶּֽגְבָּה׃ <S%H5045><s%> han-Neg-bah. toward the south פ Peh

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi now there was רָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> ra-'Av And there was a famine בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz; in the land וַיֵּ֨רֶד <S%H3381><s%> vai-Ye-red went down אַבְרָ֤ם <S%H87><s%> 'av-Ram and Abram מִצְרַ֙יְמָה֙ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ray-mah into Egypt לָג֣וּר <S%H1481><s%> la-Gur to sojourn שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, there כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for כָבֵ֥ד <S%H3515><s%> cha-Ved [was] grievous הָרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> ha-ra-'Av there for the famine בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz. in the land

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher And it came to pass when הִקְרִ֖יב <S%H7126><s%> hik-Riv he was come near לָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> la-Vo to enter מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-ye-mah; into Egypt וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer that he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to שָׂרַ֣י <S%H8297><s%> sa-Rai unto Sarai אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> ish-To, his wife הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> hin-neh- Behold נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> na now יָדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ti, I know כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah woman יְפַת־ <S%H3303><s%> ye-fat- that thou [art] a fair מַרְאֶ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> mar-'Eh to look upon אָֽתְּ׃ <S%H859><s%> 'At. you

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah, become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- and when יִרְא֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> yir-'U shall see אֹתָךְ֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-toCh הַמִּצְרִ֔ים <S%H4713><s%> ham-mitz-Rim, Therefore it shall come to pass when the Egyptians וְאָמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-me-Ru thee that they shall say אִשְׁתּ֣וֹ <S%H802><s%> ish-To This [is] his wife זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> Zot; and they וְהָרְג֥וּ <S%H2026><s%> ve-ha-re-Gu and they will kill אֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti וְאֹתָ֥ךְ <S%H853><s%> ve-'o-Tach יְחַיּֽוּ׃ <S%H2421><s%> ye-chai-Yu. me but they will save thee alive

אִמְרִי־ <S%H559><s%> 'im-ri- Say נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> na I pray thee אֲחֹ֣תִי <S%H269><s%> 'a-Cho-ti thou [art] my sister אָ֑תְּ <S%H859><s%> 'At; you לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an that יִֽיטַב־ <S%H3190><s%> yi-tav- it may be well לִ֣י li בַעֲבוּרֵ֔ךְ <S%H5668><s%> va-'a-vu-Rech, because וְחָיְתָ֥ה <S%H2421><s%> ve-cha-ye-Tah shall live נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi with me for thy sake and my soul בִּגְלָלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1558><s%> big-la-Lech. because of thee

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came כְּב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> ke-Vo was come אַבְרָ֖ם <S%H87><s%> 'av-Ram And it came to pass that when Abram מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-ye-mah; into Egypt וַיִּרְא֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> vai-yir-'U beheld הַמִּצְרִים֙ <S%H4713><s%> ham-mitz-Rim the Egyptians אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָ֣אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah, the woman כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for יָפָ֥ה <S%H3303><s%> ya-Fah fair הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. that she [was] very

וַיִּרְא֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> vai-yir-'U saw אֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei The princes פַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> far-'Oh, also of Pharaoh וַיְהַֽלְל֥וּ <S%H1984><s%> vay-hal-Lu her and commended אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- her before פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh; Pharaoh וַתֻּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> vat-tuk-Kach was taken הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah and the woman בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh. into Pharaoh's

וּלְאַבְרָ֥ם <S%H87><s%> ul-'av-Ram Abram הֵיטִ֖יב <S%H3190><s%> hei-Tiv well בַּעֲבוּרָ֑הּ <S%H5668><s%> ba-'a-vu-Rah; her sake וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- and gave ל֤וֹ lo צֹאן־ <S%H6629><s%> tzon- for her sake and he had sheep וּבָקָר֙ <S%H1241><s%> u-va-Kar and oxen וַחֲמֹרִ֔ים <S%H2543><s%> va-cha-mo-Rim, and he asses וַעֲבָדִים֙ <S%H5650><s%> va-'a-va-Dim and menservants וּשְׁפָחֹ֔ת <S%H8198><s%> u-she-fa-Chot, and maidservants וַאֲתֹנֹ֖ת <S%H860><s%> va-'a-to-Not and she asses וּגְמַלִּֽים׃ <S%H1581><s%> u-ge-mal-Lim. and camels

וַיְנַגַּ֨ע <S%H5060><s%> vay-nag-Ga' plagued יְהוָ֧ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פַּרְעֹ֛ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh Pharaoh נְגָעִ֥ים <S%H5061><s%> ne-ga-'Im plagues גְּדֹלִ֖ים <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lim with great וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To; and his house עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- because דְּבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> de-Var because of שָׂרַ֖י <S%H8297><s%> sa-Rai Sarai אֵ֥שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet wife אַבְרָֽם׃ <S%H87><s%> 'av-Ram. Abram's

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called פַרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> far-'Oh And Pharaoh לְאַבְרָ֔ם <S%H87><s%> le-'av-Ram, Abram וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What זֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> zot you עָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ta What [is] this [that] thou hast done לִּ֑י Li; לָ֚מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not הִגַּ֣דְתָּ <S%H5046><s%> hig-Gad-ta unto me;why didst thou not tell לִּ֔י Li, כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אִשְׁתְּךָ֖ <S%H802><s%> 'ish-te-Cha ess הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> hi he

לָמָ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> la-Mah Why אָמַ֙רְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ta Why saidst thou אֲחֹ֣תִי <S%H269><s%> 'a-Cho-ti other הִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he וָאֶקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> va-'ek-Kach take אֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah לִ֖י li לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> le-'ish-Shah; her to me to wife וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah then הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh here אִשְׁתְּךָ֖ <S%H802><s%> 'ish-te-Cha now therefore behold thy wife קַ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> kach take וָלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1980><s%> va-Lech. her and go

וַיְצַ֥ו <S%H6680><s%> vay-Tzav commanded עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav concerning פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh And Pharaoh אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shim; men וַֽיְשַׁלְּח֥וּ <S%H7971><s%> vay-shal-le-Chu concerning him and they sent him away אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H802><s%> ish-To and his wife וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after לֽוֹ׃ lo.
